SELECT a.id AS sspAppId, a.appName, a.terminal, a.appType, a.appId, a.bosshead, a.validateQid, a.remark, s.slotId, s.slotName, s.pgtype, s.slotDesc, s.slotImgs, s.adnum, s.slotSort, s.styleIds, s.floorPrice, ss.sellSeatId FROM adv_ssp_slot s INNER JOIN adv_ssp_application a ON s.appId = a.Id AND a.STATUS = 1 AND a.validateQid = 0 INNER JOIN adv_dict_adstyle d ON FIND_IN_SET( d.id, s.styleIds ) AND d.STATUS = 1 LEFT JOIN adv_ssp_slot_seal ss ON s.slotId = ss.slotId WHERE s.STATUS = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT a.id AS sspAppId, a.appName, a.terminal, a.appType, a.appId, a.bosshead, a.validateQid, a.remark, s.slotId, s.slotName, s.pgtype, s.slotDesc, s.slotImgs, s.adnum, s.slotSort, s.styleIds, s.floorPrice, ss.sellSeatId FROM adv_ssp_slot s INNER JOIN adv_ssp_application a ON s.appId = a.Id AND a.STATUS = 1 AND a.validateQid = 1 INNER JOIN adv_dict_adstyle d ON FIND_IN_SET( d.id, s.styleIds ) AND d.STATUS = 1 LEFT JOIN adv_ssp_slot_seal ss ON s.slotId = ss.slotId WHERE s.STATUS = 1 AND a.id IN ( SELECT q.appId FROM adv_ssp_qid q WHERE q.STATUS = 1 )

SELECT a.id AS sspAppId, a.appName, a.terminal, a.appType, a.appId, a.bosshead, a.validateQid, a.remark, q.qid, q.qidCode FROM adv_ssp_qid q INNER JOIN adv_ssp_application a ON q.appId = a.id WHERE q.STATUS = 1 AND a.STATUS = 1 AND a.validateQid = 1

SELECT ds.sellSeatId, GROUP_CONCAT( ss.slotId ) AS slotIds, ds.shellSeatName, ds.priority, ds.styleIds, ds.terminals, ds.perCode, ds.perType FROM adv_dict_sell_seat ds LEFT JOIN adv_ssp_slot_seal ss ON ds.sellSeatId = ss.sellSeatId WHERE ds.STATUS = 1 GROUP BY ss.sellSeatId

SELECT da.id AS styleId, da.txtlen, da.styleType, da.styleName, da.styleValue, da.width, da.height, da.number, da.iconwidth, da.iconheight, da.perType, da.perCode, da.txtlen, da.subtxtlen, da.imgFormatimgFormat AS imgFormat, da.supportadx FROM adv_dict_adstyle da WHERE da.STATUS = 1
